mapper.select: SELECT dmcs.id, dmcs.main_symp_code, dmcs.disease_code, dmcs.conc_symp_code, dmcs.symp_spec, dmcs.rate, dmcs.default_order, dcs.symp_name, dcs.popu_name, dcs.symbol, dcs.gender, dcs.min_age, dcs.max_age, dcs.is_common, dcs.display_type, dmcs.type_flag FROM diagnosis_mainsymp_concsymp dmcs INNER JOIN diagnosis_concomitant_symptom dcs ON ( dcs.symp_code = dmcs.conc_symp_code and dmcs.type_flag = 1 ) WHERE dmcs.main_symp_code = #{mainSympCode} AND IFNULL(dmcs.operate_type, '') not in ('D','H') AND IFNULL(dcs.operate_type, '') not in ('D','H') group BY conc_symp_code ORDER BY is_common DESC,default_order

SELECT dmcs.id, dmcs.main_symp_code, dmcs.disease_code, dmcs.conc_symp_code, dmcs.symp_spec, dmcs.rate, dmcs.default_order, dcs.symp_name, dcs.popu_name, dcs.symbol, dcs.gender, dcs.min_age, dcs.max_age, dcs.is_common, dcs.display_type, dmcs.type_flag FROM diagnosis_mainsymp_concsymp dmcs INNER JOIN diagnosis_concomitant_symptom dcs ON ( dcs.symp_code = dmcs.conc_symp_code ) INNER JOIN diagnosis_disease_rate ddr ON( dmcs.disease_code = ddr.disease_code AND dmcs.main_symp_code = ddr.main_symp_code ) WHERE dmcs.main_symp_code = #{mainSympCode} AND IFNULL(dmcs.operate_type, '') not in ('D','H') AND IFNULL(ddr.operate_type, '') not in ('D','H') AND IFNULL(dcs.operate_type, '') not in ('D','H')

SELECT dmcs.id, dmcs.main_symp_code, dmcs.disease_code, dmcs.conc_symp_code, dmcs.symp_spec, dmcs.rate, dmcs.default_order, dcs.symp_name, dcs.popu_name, dcs.symbol, dcs.gender, dcs.min_age, dcs.max_age, dcs.display_type FROM diagnosis_mainsymp_concsymp dmcs INNER JOIN diagnosis_concomitant_symptom dcs ON ( dcs.symp_code = dmcs.conc_symp_code ) INNER JOIN diagnosis_disease_rate ddr ON( dmcs.disease_code = ddr.disease_code AND dmcs.main_symp_code = ddr.main_symp_code ) WHERE dmcs.main_symp_code = #{mainSympCode} AND dcs.is_common = 1 AND IFNULL(dmcs.operate_type, '') not in ('D','H') AND IFNULL(ddr.operate_type, '') not in ('D','H') AND IFNULL(dcs.operate_type, '') not in ('D','H')
